This is the Windows 95 Upgrade disc, not the standalone.

If this is the CD version, the downloaded file should be a single .iso file ready to burn to a CD.
If this is the floppy version, there should be separate image (.img) files ready to copy to floppies.

This .rar package is neither.  It has 40 files in it, which appear to be what you would see if you directoried the CD version after burning it.
